summary: The module defines a RadTTSModel class that implements an end‑to‑end neural text‑to‑speech system based on the RADTTS architecture. It integrates tokenization, text normalization, data preprocessing, loss computation (including attention binarization), training and validation loops, spectrogram synthesis, model export, and logging utilities, leveraging NeMo and PyTorch Lightning components.
business_intent: Enable developers and enterprises to build, train, evaluate, and deploy high‑quality speech synthesis models for applications such as virtual assistants, audiobooks, and accessibility tools, providing a streamlined pipeline from raw text to acoustic features.
